creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: predominantly black and white bag with embroidered horse motifs; bag has a long thin strap decorated with chevron figures; balled tassels decorated bottom edge of bag; bag has green, blue, and purple accents around edges; side of bag with animal motifs has small embroidered flap
title: Mourning bag
